definition: a very loud utterance, similar to the sound of an animal, to shout loudly and without restraint
details:
noun
- a very loud utterance, similar to the sound of an animal
= example: a very loud utterance, similar to the sound of an animal
= synonyms: roaring
verb
- to shout loudly and without restraint
= example: to shout loudly and without restraint
= synonyms: bawl
- to make a loud noise, as of animal
= example: to make a loud noise, as of animal
= synonyms: roar
